conversations.english: Would you like to go skiing with me? I heard the new ski area is great. They have safe tracks, especially for the beginners and provide free training. I think it suits you best.
conversations.chinese: 你要和我一起去滑雪吗？我听说有一个新的滑雪的地方很不错。它们有安全的路线，特别是对于新手，它们还提供免费培训。我想它最适合你了。
conversations.reply_english: Sounds not bad! You know, the only thing I worried about is the safety. I’m not an active exerciser and my muscle may be not strong enough for such an intense sport.
conversations.reply_chinese: 听起来不错！你知道的，我唯一担心的问题是安全。我不是一个活跃的运动者，对于那样一项激烈的运动，我的肌肉还不够强壮。

conversations.english: Is the Chinese team taking the lead?
conversations.chinese: 是中国队领先吗？
conversations.reply_english: No,it's the Japanese team.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，是日本队。

conversations.english: Can you tell the result?
conversations.chinese: 能告诉我比赛结果吗？
conversations.reply_english: It's love all.
conversations.reply_chinese: 零比零.

title: 凤凰队轻胜对手Overpowered its counterpart

conversations.english: The Phoenix team overpowered its counterpart 86 to 50.
conversations.chinese: 凤凰队86比50轻胜对手。
conversations.reply_english: They're absolutely right to get a replacement for 21.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他们把21号换下来是非常正确的。

conversations.english: How are you feeling, champ? Ready to go?
conversations.chinese: 你感觉如何啊，冠军？准备去了吗？
conversations.reply_english: You know, if I can keep up my workouts, I think I have a chance in 2004.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你知道吗，要是我能持续锻炼的话，我觉得我在2004年有机会

conversations.english: What are the most popular sports in your country?
conversations.chinese: 人们最喜爱的运动项目是什么?
conversations.reply_english: Swimming in summer and skating in winter.What's your favorite sport?
conversations.reply_chinese: 夏天是游泳冬天是溜冰,你喜欢什么

title: 我认为他的金牌当之无愧

conversations.english: I think he deserved his gold.
conversations.chinese: 我认为他的金牌当之无愧。
conversations.reply_english: Did you see his last dive?
conversations.reply_chinese: 他的最后一次跳水你看见了吗？

conversations.english: I don't know. I think you might be over the hill.
conversations.chinese: 不知道。我想或许你已经过了巅峰。
conversations.reply_english: Well, if not gymnastics, then mountain biking.
conversations.reply_chinese: 呃，若是体操不成，那么山地自行车也行。

conversations.english: Are you watching the soccer match tonight? It must be the most exciting one in this season.
conversations.chinese: 你要看今晚的足球比赛吗？那应该是这个赛季最刺激的一场比赛。
conversations.reply_english: Well, of course I can’t miss it. Which team are you for?
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我当然不会错过。你支持哪支球队？

title: 足球比赛比分是多少What's the score

conversations.english: What's the score?
conversations.chinese: 比分是多少？
conversations.reply_english: The Ukraine team took the lead by 3 to 1 at the end of the first half.
conversations.reply_chinese: 上半场乌克兰队3比1领先。

title: 比赛结果二平The game ended in two all

conversations.english: Which team has won?
conversations.chinese: 哪个队赢了？
conversations.reply_english: Neither.The game ended in two all.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哪个队也没有赢，比赛结果二平。

conversations.english: Your muscles are a spectacle!
conversations.chinese: 你的肌肉真健壮！
conversations.reply_english: Thank you.That's the result of exercise.By the way,do you work out?
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢,这是锻练的结果.随便问一句,你进行健身锻炼吗?

conversations.english: Are you a wrestler or a boxer?
conversations.chinese: 你是摔跤运动员吧，要不就是拳击手？
conversations.reply_english: No.Why?
conversations.reply_chinese: 不是，怎么这么说呢？

conversations.english: I can see you've got some color back in your cheeks.
conversations.chinese: 看得出来你脸上有了血色。
conversations.reply_english: Yes,I find jogging does good to me,so I keep on doing it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,我发现慢跑对我有好处,所以我就坚持下来了.

conversations.english: You look fresh recently.How do you make it?
conversations.chinese: 你近来看起来精神挺好，怎么做的？
conversations.reply_english: I attend an aerobic class three times a week.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我一周上三次健美课。

conversations.english: You look pale today.
conversations.chinese: 你今天脸色苍白。
conversations.reply_english: I didn't wear make-up this morning.
conversations.reply_chinese: 今早我没化妆。

conversations.english: I'm feeling wonderful.
conversations.chinese: 我觉得好极了。
conversations.reply_english: Are you crazy?The papers make everybody listless.I don't think you are the exception
conversations.reply_chinese: 你疯了吗?论文使大家都无精打采,我想你也不例外.

title: 我已经非常健康了In perfect health

conversations.english: Do you drink the Robust Milk every day?
conversations.chinese: 你每天都喝乐百氏奶吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not every day,but occasionally.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不是每天，偶尔喝。

title: 足球现场直播Live show of a football match

conversations.english: We have a live show of a football match this Firday night.
conversations.chinese: 这个周五晚上有足球现场直播。
conversations.reply_english: What're the teams?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是哪些队？

conversations.english: OK, everyone. Gather around. Here are the rules. No tackling. No pushing.
conversations.chinese: 好的，大家。靠过来。现在宣布规则。不准擒抱摔倒。不准推.
conversations.reply_english: You shouldn't grab someone else's shirt. That's a foul.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不可以抓别人的上衣。那样算犯规。

conversations.english: Come on, you are left behind!
conversations.chinese: 加油啊，你落后了！
conversations.reply_english: Wow, I can't catch my breath. You are running too fast, honey.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哇哦，我快喘不过气了。 你跑得太快了，亲爱的。

conversations.english: What are you doing?
conversations.chinese: 你在干什么？
conversations.reply_english: What am I doing? What am I doing? Don’t you know what day it is?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在做什么？我在做什么？你不知道今天是什么日子吗？

conversations.english: Wow, this is drop-dead gorgeous.
conversations.chinese: 哇噻，比赛真是太精彩了！
conversations.reply_english: So no more regret now?
conversations.reply_chinese: 那么现在不再后悔了吧？

conversations.english: Honey, wait! I've sprained my ankle.
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，等等！我把脚踝给扭了。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, my god, are you OK?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，天哪！你还好吗？

conversations.english: Good afternoon, madam. How can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 下午好，女士。有什么能为您效劳的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I am a bit out of shape. I'm thinking about getting some exercises to keep fit.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那个，我身体有点走形了，我在考虑做点运动来保持体型。

conversations.english: Hi, Shirley, it's a surprise to see you here!
conversations.chinese: 你好啊，雪莉，真没想到在这儿遇见你！
conversations.reply_english: Hi, nice to see you!
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好！见到你真高兴！

conversations.english: You look great!
conversations.chinese: 你看起来真棒！
conversations.reply_english: Thanks to you. I'm totally pumped up.
conversations.reply_chinese: 多亏了你。我感觉很精神。

title: 冬季奥林匹克运动会Winter Olympics

conversations.english: Do you like watching the Winter Olympic Games?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢看冬季奥林匹克运动会的比赛吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course. It's the tradition game in winter, and with good reason. Don't you like watching it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然了。这可是冬天的传统活动，是合乎情理的。你难道不喜欢吗？

conversations.english: Hurry up! Mom, I can't wait any more.
conversations.chinese: 快点妈妈，我等不及了。
conversations.reply_english: Look out, honey. Let's come to the shoal waters. Follow me!
conversations.reply_chinese: 当心点，孩子。我们去浅水区吧，跟我来。

conversations.english: Look, daddy is on again. Don't you think he is handsome?
conversations.chinese: 看，爸爸又上场了。难道你不认为他很帅吗？
conversations.reply_english: To some extent, he is. And what do you think we move to a better place? I can't see him clearly from here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 在某种程度上说，他是。我们换个地方你觉得怎样？我在这看得不太清楚。

conversations.english: Welcome, young man. No offence, but I haven't seen you here before.
conversations.chinese: 欢迎光临，年轻人。没有冒犯的意思，但是我好像以前没有见过你。
conversations.reply_english: Of course, this is my first time here. My Mom has a membership here. Here is the card.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然了，这是我第一次来。我妈妈是这里的会员。这是她的会员卡。

title: 篮球中场休息 Break Time

conversations.english: Hey, what sort of drinks do you want? Gatorade or water?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，你想要什么样的饮料？佳得乐还是水？
conversations.reply_english: Gatorade. It’s rich in Vitamin and it gives us energy and vitality.
conversations.reply_chinese: 佳得乐。它含有丰富的维生素，能给我们补充能量和注入活力。

conversations.english: Hello, is it necessary to do warm-up exercise? I can't wait to dive into the water.
conversations.chinese: 你好，必须做热身运动吗？我想立马下水。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry. Every customer coming here must do the warm-up exercise before getting down to swimming. That's out regulation.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起，任何一位到我们这来的顾客在下水游泳之前必须要做热身运动。这是我们的规定。

conversations.english: Look! Mom, that's amazing! I can't believe the girls have so neat movements.
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，快看。那太神奇了！我真不敢相信她们的动作这么整齐。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, they all received very strict training. A minute on the stage takes ten-year practice.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，她们都经过严格的训练。台上一分钟台下十年功。

conversations.english: I don’t understand why you always look so happy, so energetic. It seems like you’ve got good news everyday.
conversations.chinese: 我不知道你为什么看起来总是这么高兴，这么有活力。好像你每天都有好消息。
conversations.reply_english: Really? Do I look happy all the time?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？我看起来总是很高兴吗？

conversations.english: Hi, Kate.
conversations.chinese: 嗨，凯特。
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Don. What a surprise!
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，唐。真是意想不到啊！
